languages.text: {n}В глазах людей читается нескрываемая радость.{/n} "Благодарение Императору! Спасены и прощены! Все исполним, как велено, рта больше не раскроем..." {n}Торопливо кланяясь, беженцы пятятся прочь.{/n}
{n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах людей читается нескрываемая радость.{/n} "Благодарение Императору! Спасены и прощены! Все исполним, как велено, рта больше не раскроем..." {n}Торопливо кланяясь, беженцы пятятся прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}
{n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}
{n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}
{n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}
{n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らの目に生気が宿った。{/n}「皇帝万歳！許されたぞ！余計なことは今後一切言わず、命じられたとおりにいたします…」{n}急いで礼を言うと、難民たちはそそくさと離れていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らの目に生気が宿った。{/n}「皇帝万歳！許されたぞ！余計なことは今後一切言わず、命じられたとおりにいたします…」{n}急いで礼を言うと、難民たちはそそくさと離れていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们的眼睛闪闪发光。{/n}“赞美帝皇！我们得救了，被赦免了！我们立刻就去做，一句废话都不多说了……”{n}难民们急忙鞠了一躬，从你身边退开。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们的眼睛闪闪发光。{/n}“赞美帝皇！我们得救了，被赦免了！我们立刻就去做，一句废话都不多说了……”{n}难民们急忙鞠了一躬，从你身边退开。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les brillan los ojos.{/n} «¡Alabado sea el Emperador! ¡Estamos salvados y perdonados! Cumpliremos su voluntad; no diremos ni una palabra más...». {n}Los refugiados, con sus reverencias instantáneas, retroceden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les brillan los ojos.{/n} «¡Alabado sea el Emperador! ¡Estamos salvados y perdonados! Cumpliremos su voluntad; no diremos ni una palabra más...». {n}Los refugiados, con sus reverencias instantáneas, retroceden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leurs yeux s'illuminent.{/n} « Loué soit l'Empereur ! Nous sommes sauvés et pardonnés ! Nous ferons tout ce que vous voudrez sans broncher... » {n}S'inclinant à la hâte, les réfugiés s'éloignent de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leurs yeux s'illuminent.{/n} « Loué soit l'Empereur ! Nous sommes sauvés et pardonnés ! Nous ferons tout ce que vous voudrez sans broncher... » {n}S'inclinant à la hâte, les réfugiés s'éloignent de vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihre Augen strahlen.{/n} "Gepriesen sei der Imperator! Wir wurden gerettet und begnadigt! Wir werden tun, was man uns befiehlt, und kein Wort mehr sagen ..." {n}Die Flüchtlinge verbeugen sich hastig und weichen vor dir zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Augen strahlen.{/n} "Gepriesen sei der Imperator! Wir wurden gerettet und begnadigt! Wir werden tun, was man uns befiehlt, und kein Wort mehr sagen ..." {n}Die Flüchtlinge verbeugen sich hastig und weichen vor dir zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sığınmacıların gözleri parlıyor.{/n} "İmparator'a hamdolsun! Canımız kurtuldu, affedildik! Siz ne derseniz o, asla sözünüzden çıkmayız..." {n}Sığınmacılar hızla eğilerek önünden çekiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their eyes beam.{/n} "Praise be to the Emperor! We're saved and pardoned! We'll do as we're told, we won't say another word..." {n}Bowing hastily, the refugees back away from you.{/n}
